name: DEFILE (itch)
description:
A man seeks shelter from a thunderstorm inside the abandoned manor once home to the famous Elisa Alden also known as the blood queen. Discover the story behind the blood queen and perform rituals to end the evil entity which now has taken over her spirit and inhabits the manor.

FEATURES

⚫ Discover the story behind the blood queen and bring an end to the evil entity which now inhabits the manor.

⚫ Atmospheric realistic setting using photo realism and photo scanned materials.

⚫ Diverse arrangement of puzzles.

⚫ Stealth mechanics and ritual mechanics

⚫ Random generated audio, thunder system and paranormal events. 

CONTROLS

⚫ Movement = WASD ( Can be rebinded to whatever you prefer )

⚫ RUN / CROUCH / CRAWL = Left shift / Left CTRL / C

⚫ STORED ITEMS = TAB

⚫ INTERACT / EXAMINE = E / Q

⚫ HIDE AT STEALTH AREA = E

You can adjust quality settings inside the game through ESC > Options. You can view / edit controls inside the game through ESC > Controls.

PS4 / XboxOne Controller Support - Connect before executing the game and it will auto detect input at launch. Due to auto detection you must disconnect controller before launching if you want Keyboard&Mouse.

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10
    • Processor: Intel i5
    • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Standard
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10
    • Processor: Intel i7
    • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Standard

Created by Aza Game Studio.
